section.title: Sharing images
section.para: The &CImA; allows users to share images they have created with others and to use images created by someone else. To learn more about the fundamentals of image sharing, see “Image Sharing”. The following examples show some basic image sharing operations with cURL examples.

section.title: Create an Image Member
section.para: If you have an image you'd like to share with a particular user, you need to create an image member for that user and associate it with the image.

section.title: Delete an Image Member
section.para: If you decide to no longer share your image with a user, you need to delete that image member.
